text: Kiss This is a "best of" compilation by the Sex Pistols released in 1992, which features all of Never Mind the Bollocks, Here's the Sex Pistols' album tracks, interspersed with singles and B-sides. Originally it was issued with a bonus CD featuring 21 July 1977 show at Trondheim and a foldout colour poster. ==Track listing== ===Kiss This=== #"Anarchy in the U.K." #"God Save the Queen" #"Pretty Vacant" #"Holidays in the Sun" #"I Wanna Be Me" #"Did You No Wrong" (Lydon/Matlock/Nightingale/Cook/Jones)http://apraamcos.com.au/search?searchtype=works&keywords;=Did+you+no+wrong&x;=36&y;=36 #"No Fun" (Alexander/Asheton/Asheton/Osterberg) #"Satellite" #"Don't Give Me No Lip, Child" #"(I'm Not Your) Stepping Stone" (Boyce/Hart) #"Bodies" #"No Feelings" #"Liar" #"Problems" #"Seventeen" #"Submission" #"New York" #"EMI (Unlimited Edition)" #"My Way" (Anka/Revaud/Francois/Thibaut) #"Silly Thing""Silly Thing" is not the version of the song that appears on The Great Rock 'N' Roll Swindle album, but the single version of the track which has vocals by Steve Jones instead of Paul Cook () === Live In Trondheim 21st July 1977 === #"Anarchy in the U.K." #"I Wanna Be Me" #"Seventeen" #"New York" #"EMI (Unlimited Edition)" #"No Fun" #"No Feelings" #"Problems" #"God Save the Queen" ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Chart (1992) !Peak position |- |Australia (ARIA Charts) | style="text-align:center;"|40 |} ==References== Category:1992 greatest hits albums Category:Sex Pistols compilation albums Category:Virgin Records compilation albums
title: Kiss This
